name: Bitcoin Mining Simulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to experience the amazingness that is Bitcoin mining without spending a truck load of cash for Miners? Than this is the Simulator for you!

Cookie-Clicker inspired, take on the task of starting off with a small $100 as you try to build your empire with tons of different Bitcoin miners!

The ultimate goal you ask? Well that's easy, earn enough Bitcoin (1M) to take over the world!
